程序包 game.interfaces

接口 PlayerInterface

所有已知实现类:
Player
public interface PlayerInterface
the interface is used by other classes(actors/actions) which need to interact with Player or get attributes of player. Such as the HealAction. The interface can protect Player Class

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean addSouls​(int souls)
    add player's souls number
    int getHealthPotion()
    get the number of Estus Flask that the player holds now
    int getHitPoints()
    get player's hit points

    Get the player's Maximum hitPoints

    get player's souls number

    Do some damage to the player.

      Get the player's Maximum hitPoints
      返回:

      Subtract the number of Estus Flask

      get the number of Estus Flask that the player holds now

    • getHitPoints

      int getHitPoints()

      返回:

    • getSoul

      int getSoul()
      get player's souls number
      返回:
      number of souls

    • setHealthPotion

      void setHealthPotion​(int healthPotion)
      set plyaer's healthPotion (Estus Flask)
      参数:

    • setHitPoints

      void setHitPoints​(int hitPoints)
      set player's hitPoints
      参数:

    • hurt

      void hurt​(int points)
      Do some damage to the player.
      参数:
      points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

    • addSouls

      boolean addSouls​(int souls)
      add player's souls number
      参数:
      souls - number of souls
      返回:
      boolean value to judge if it's successful
